WARNING!

OpCode Cache Detected!

We have detected that your Apigility Admin API is running with a PHP OpCode Cache enabled. You will need to disable it in order to ensure that the API will be able to perform its operations.

To do this, you will need to either edit your php.ini file or your web server configuration (in which case you will set a PHP admin configuration directive). The setting you will need to change will depend on the OpCode Cache you have enabled, per the table below.

OpCode Cache Setting Value
APC apc.enabled "0"
EAccelerator eaccelerator.enable "0"
OpCache opcache.enable "0"
WinCache wincache.ocenabled "0"
XCache xcache.cacher "0"
Zend Data Cache zend_datacache.apc_compatibility "0" or "Off"
Zend Optimizer+ zend_optimizerplus.enable "0"

Please make the setting change indicated, restart your web server, and then reload this page.
